name: Primos
description: An ecosystem of NFTs, games, and community governance featuring multiple interactive experiences including daily raffles, NFT evolution, material crafting, and check-in rewards.

websites.description: Main portal - An ecosystem of NFTs, games, and community governance
Primolotto - Participate in daily raffles to win Fire Dust, PRIMOS NFTs, crafting materials, and much more
Primos Blacksmith - Use Primateria materials in combination to craft new ones
Primos Check-In - Rewards NFT holders with daily Fire Dust tokens based on their NFT rarity and consecutive check-in streaks
Primos Evolution - Transform your Primos into more powerful versions with new appearances

contracts.label: Primos The Stone Age
contracts.description: Main NFT collection contract for the Primos ecosystem

contracts.label: Primos - Primateria
contracts.description: Primateria is the core resource of Primos, essential for crafting, evolution, and summoning powerful warriors in the Ronin universe

contracts.label: Primo Lotto V9
contracts.description: Smart contract for daily raffles and prize distribution
